homepage.organizerDesription: A personal organizer for your daily tasks

home.title: Learn with Lingvo
home.text: Your daily assistant for language learning. Make your study more comfortable and effective with everything you need. Start for free.

card1.text: Create vocabulary lists exactly according to what you need to learn right now.

card2.text: Don’t just read — listen too. You can play every word to hear the correct pronunciation.

card3.text: Thanks to the "Temperature" indicator, you can clearly see which words you already know well enough to practice.

card4.text: Write grammar summaries, cheat sheets, or full texts. Keep all your theory clearly organized next to your vocabulary.

faq.title: WHAT ELSE MIGHT YOU WANT TO KNOW?
faq.text: Answers to frequently asked questions that will help you better understand how the app works.

faq1.question: What is Lingvo?
faq1.answer: Lingvo is a modern language-learning app that combines a digital dictionary, audio pronunciation, and advanced progress tracking.

faq2.question: Is the app free?
faq2.answer: Yes, the basic version of the app is completely free. We also offer premium features for a small fee.

faq3.question: Who is this app for?
faq3.answer: The app is designed for anyone who wants to learn foreign languages — from beginners to advanced learners.

faq4.question: Does the website work on mobile and tablet?
faq4.answer: Yes, the app is fully responsive and works on all devices — desktop, tablet, and mobile phone.

faq5.question: Can I customize the app for any language?
faq5.answer: Yes, you can create your own dictionaries for any language you want to study.
